title: Top 10 Scariest American Horror Story Moments
author: WatchMojo.com
comment: Violet discovering her own body is the most heartbreaking thing I’ve ever seen
This should be titled “Most Disturbing”, not scariest.
Hotel doesn’t have enough recognition, the whole season is one big acid trip.
Asylum is the best season. Perfect mixture of psychological, possession, torture and slasher horror with lots of gore, monsters and even fucking aliens. OG season.
The scariest  for me was the season 4 finale when dandy shoots all the freaks. It's the realism that makes it scary.
description:
The scariest American Horror Story moments gave this anthology series its name. We’re looking at the most bone-chilling scares in American Horror Story. The focus will be more on psychological horror rather than gory or shocking scenes. WatchMojo ranks the scariest American Horror Story moments. Which AHS moment scared you the most? Let us know in the comments!

Watch more great AHS related content here: 
Top 10 American Horror Story Villains -
